## Description
What needs to be updated or refactored? (e.g., "Upgrade Playwright to latest for better stealth").

## Impacted Dependencies
- [ ] FastAPI / Python
- [ ] Next.js / Tailwind
- [ ] Redis / Database Schema
- [ ] Playwright / Scrapers

## Tasks
- [ ] Update `requirements.txt` / `package.json`.
- [ ] Verify existing scraper stealth logic passes.
- [ ] Ensure local `.env` keys are still valid.
